attributes.action: Reform the House of Lords by reinstating all of the hereditory peers removed in House of Lords Act 199
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the scandal involving the Upper House, we believe that the only way to restore confidence is to reinstate the hard working, unbiased hereditory peers who have according to poll after poll been shown to take their roles much more seriously than any appointed life peers.
